item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-02-04
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Starbucks (Waban) (474 Woodward Street, Waban). #
  • Fought with VMWare + IIS + SQLServer on my Macpro, so close to making it all work. VMWare is very sweet though. #
  • RT: Looks like there's going to be a Watchmen 2. And I'm not joking - /via @brendonconnelly #
  • There are some new quirks in Firefox 3.6 that are making me reconsider using it as my primary browser. Anyone else notice issues with it? #

Powered by Twitter Tools
